23 #define MAKE_SETTINGS() \
24  EXSET(bool, shuffle, false, "randomize order of examples") \
25  EXSET(bool, balanced, false, "provide equal number of positive and negative examples as determined by label") \
26  EXSET(bool, stratify_receptor, false, "sample uniformly across receptors (first molecule)") \
27  EXSET(int, labelpos, 0, "position of binary label") \
28  EXSET(int, stratify_pos, 1, "position of label for numerical stratification") \
29  EXSET(bool, stratify_abs, true, "stratify based on absolute value, for cases where negative has special meaning (e.g., hinge loss indicator)") \
30  EXSET(float, stratify_min, 0, "minimum range for value stratification") \
31  EXSET(float, stratify_max, 0, "maximum range for value stratification") \
32  EXSET(float, stratify_step, 0, "step size for value stratification, together with min and max determines number of bins") \
33  EXSET(int, group_batch_size, 1, "slice time series (groups) by batches of this size") \
34  EXSET(int, max_group_size, 0, "maximum group size, all groups are padded out to this size; example file must contain group number in first column") \
35  EXSET(bool, cache_structs, true, "retain coordinates in memory for faster training") \
36  EXSET(bool, add_hydrogens, true, "protonate read in molecule using openbabel") \
37  EXSET(bool, duplicate_first, false, "clone the first coordinate set to be paired with each of the remaining (receptor-ligand pairs)") \
38  EXSET(bool, make_vector_types, false, "convert index types into one-hot encoded vector types") \
39  EXSET(std::string, data_root, "", "prefix for data files") \
40  EXSET(std::string, recmolcache, "", "precalculated molcache2 file for receptor (first molecule); if doesn't exist, will look in data _root") \
41  EXSET(std::string, ligmolcache, "", "precalculated molcache2 file for ligand; if doesn't exist, will look in data_root")

118  template <bool isCUDA>
119  static void extract_label(const std::vector<Example>& examples, unsigned labelpos, Grid<float, 1, isCUDA>& out);
120 
121  //pointer equality, implemented for python vector
122  bool operator==(const Example& rhs) const {
123  return sets == rhs.sets && labels == rhs.labels;
124  }
125 
126  void togpu() { for(unsigned i = 0, n = sets.size(); i < n; i++) { sets[i].togpu(); } }
127  void tocpu() { for(unsigned i = 0, n = sets.size(); i < n; i++) { sets[i].tocpu(); } }
128 
130  void make_vector_types() { for(unsigned i = 0, n = sets.size(); i < n; i++) { sets[i].make_vector_types(); } }
131 
133  bool has_vector_types(unsigned start = 0) const;
134 
136  bool has_index_types(unsigned start = 0) const;
137 };

155 //for memory efficiency, only store a given string once and use the const char*
156 class StringCache {
157  std::unordered_set<std::string> strings;
158 public:
159  const char* get(const std::string& s)
160  {
161  strings.insert(s);
162  //we assume even as the set is resized that strings never get allocated
163  return strings.find(s)->c_str();
164  }
165 };
166 
167 extern StringCache string_cache;
